Description: Textile (tiraz fragment), woven in undyed, yellow, orange, green and brown silk; decorated with two parallel bands of different width (4.5cm and 1.5cm), bearing friezes of medaillons with geometric and stylised vegetal and animal motifs in multicoloured silk on a beige background. Warp: silk, undyed, S, 28/cm Weft: silk, undyed, S, 14/cm Weft: silk, brown, yellow and orange, S, 48/cm
Acquisition name: Donated by: Maj William Joseph Myers (executors of)
